cause.description:
A movement of Palestinians, Israelis, and global activists driven by an unflinching commitment to the non-violent struggle for a single, democratic, multi-ethnic state in Israel-Palestine.
1. Israel and Palestine are synonymous and refer to the same geographical region.
2. The current reality of Israel-Palestine is one of institutionalized, government-sanctioned apartheid and ethnic cleansing.
3. Apartheid, ethnic cleansing, and violence will perpetuate until partition ends.
4. A new reality of one democratic, multi-ethnic state is the only ethical and just solution to the conflict between Israelis and Palestinians.
5. A joint non-violent movement led by Palestinians and Israelis, supported by global activists, can bring about the essential changes neccessary for peace and justice in the region.
6. Anything less than a full end to partition will condone ethnic cleansing and ethnic segregation.
7. A new Law of Return, which allows Jews as well as Palestinian refugees to return to their shared homeland, must be invoked.
cause.mission: Support a new oppurtunity for Israelis and Palestinians to change the reality of their mutual existence in Israel-Palestine.
cause.name: Israel-Palestine: One country for two peoples
